title: Buffed Ghost versus Flash

embed.description: League of Legends is a free-to-play multiplayer online battle arena, real-time strategy video game developed and published by Riot Games. Download Link: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/ My thoughts on flash versus ghost. Feedback on the video is appreciated.

body:
Some thoughts on the summoner spells.
TLDR:
Flash is more versatile
Flash is immediate power
Ghost gives more power overtime
Ghost can be used more often

Conclusion:
Flash is still clearly better
Riot probably wants to nerf flash but don't want to upset the community

replies.body: Ghost is potentially better on certain champs, like Hecarim. Oh baby, Ghost pony.
I wouldn't mind some minor nerfs to flash, such as a heightened cooldown, but as it as stands, the spell is good, and other summoner spells should be elevated to its level, not the other way around.
I don't think you can compare versatility here

I think ghost is really useful for the hyper carry marksman like jinx, and tristana, vayne.  Jinx always is reliant on her passive to catch up or getaway from an enemy. You sacrafice your heal for a potentially stronger chase. As it scales equally with your ability to kite champions. Maybe add in a frozen mallet and  then mobile or not they aren't getting away easily
Ya i experimented with Ashe Ghost too but i fed like hell. Heal is too strong in early trading i feel, so unless you're abusing dynamic qeueu win lane win game heal is needed bot lane.

Flash would be on my top priority list of things to be reworked in the game. I've talked about this many times in the EUW boards. Riot won't do anything with Flash tough because, if they did, the backlash from the community would be OUTRAGEOUSly terrible.

I would change flash from a Blink to a Dash in the first place and then maybe give it something else just to prevent a possible riot from the community (hehe).

I don't think every champion should have acess to a Blink. Those types of skills are thematic to certain champions (Kassadin, Ezreal, Katarina, ...). A Dash, maybe. I'm not saying they should remove a quick mobility summoner spell, but a Blink is just too much.
A dash with increased combat strength for a short duration (like Graves's E) would be a good idea. Also, the abilty to jump over terrain should be considered because some walls shouldn't be allowed to "dash" through.

But the community doesn't agree with me on that, so I don't believe they'll ever change it.
Life lessons, never fight with the internet xD
ghost is by far better on any champion, if the enemy team doesn't have perma slows or a lot of slows like {{champion:22}}
